extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the Billings Gazette Open House application, your trusted source for finding open houses in and around the greater Billings, MT area.Hunting down and mapping out routes for open houses can be time consuming and frustrating:  either outdated information, or not enough listings.  But with the Open House application from the Billings Gazette, you can save time by searching current listings on the go.  Itâs the easiest and most reliable way to find open houses in your desired area.Search and Save by keywords, open days and times, and type of dwelling best suited to fit your needs.  View detailed information, even pictures.   Set up alerts to be notified when new open houses featuring your preferences come up.  Allow the Open House application from The Billings Gazette assist you in your quest to find the perfect home!
